errors.auth/invalid-email: Please provide a valid email address.
errors.auth/wrong-password: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
errors.auth/user-not-found: We couldn't find an account corresponding to that email address. Please check the email and try again or register for a new account.
errors.auth/user-disabled: Your account has been disabled. Please contact us if you think this is an error.
errors.auth/email-already-in-use: An account already exists for that email address. Please login to that account or use a different email.
errors.auth/operation-not-allowed: That sign in method is not enabled. Please use a supported sign in method for this account.
errors.auth/weak-password: Your password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
errors.auth/requires-recent-login: Please sign in again before performing this operation.
errors.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: An account already exists using a different sign-in method for that email.
errors.auth/credential-too-old: This credential is no longer valid. Please sign in again.
errors.auth/invalid-credential: The credential used is malformed or invalid.
errors.auth/invalid-verification-code: The verification code you entered is invalid. Please try again.
errors.auth/invalid-verification-id: The verification ID provided is invalid.
errors.auth/missing-verification-code: A verification code is required for this operation.
errors.auth/missing-verification-id: A verification ID is required for this operation.
errors.auth/invalid-action-code: The action code is invalid. This can happen if the code is malformed, expired, or has already been used.
errors.auth/registration-error: There was an error registering the user. Please try again.
errors.auth/network-request-failed: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection.
errors.auth/too-many-requests: There were too many requests. Please wait and try again later.
errors.auth/web-storage-unsupported: Browser does not support web storage.

successes.sign-up: Your account was created successfully. Welcome!
successes.reset-password: We've sent you an email to reset your password.
successes.reset-password-complete: Your password has been reset successfully.
